import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import CalendarTodayIcon from "@mui/icons-material/CalendarToday"; import LocationOnIcon from "@mui/icons-material/LocationOn"; import AlarmIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Alarm"; import CheckCircleOutlineIcon from "@mui/icons-material/CheckCircleOutline"; import AttachMoneyIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AttachMoney"; function BookingDetails() { const { id } = useParams(); // Get the event ID from URL params const [eventDetails, setEventDetails] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // Fetch event details from backend axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/foodfest/${id}`) .then(response => setEventDetails(response.data)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching event details:', error)); }, [id]); if (!eventDetails) { return
Loading...
; // You can also use a spinner or placeholder } return (

{/* Content */}

{/* card header */}

{eventDetails.location}

RM {eventDetails.price}
10% off for early birds

What you will get
View Cancellation Policy
{/* Card body */}
Price Included
{/* List */}
  • Booth size : 3m x 6m
  • Free 3pcs Exhibitor Pass (With Lanyard)
  • On Cancellation, You will not get any refund.
{/* right side content */}
{/* Card Header */}
Price Summary
{/* Card Body */}
  • Booking Price RM {eventDetails.price}
  • Tax RM 2.44
{/* Card Footer */}
Total Price RM {eventDetails.price + 2.44}
Book Now
); } export default BookingDetails;
